pageContext.claim: “The hatred and extreme bias of me by @CNN has clouded their thinking and made them unable to function. But actually, as I have always said, this has been going on for a long time. Little Jeff Z has done a terrible job, his ratings suck, & AT&T should fire him to save credibility!”
pageContext.analysis: CNN had the second best August in terms of ratings that they have ever had, the network said. They are down year over year, but still rank among the most watched daytime news programs.
